ygData.subject: RE: Nybright Sisters and taking the lives of our fello w man
ygData.msgSnippet: **** SPOILER **** There is a way to get the necessary faction.  Just repeatedly do the white headband quest (like 25 times) and then you should be able to do
ygData.messageBody:
**** SPOILER ****















There is a way to get the necessary faction. Just repeatedly do the white
headband quest (like 25 times) and then you should be able to do the
Freeport quests as well.


Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
>
> Question I am 19th and I really want to start doing the monk sash quests,
> but I am a Qeynos monk, can I make a free port monk and give the
> scroll to a
> monster and then kill the monster with my Qeynos monk to get the scroll? I
> hope so, since there is no other way to get Faction with the Ashen Order.
> Plus where is a good place for a monk of 19th season to get that all
> important 20th season as a solo and with a group? I was thinking
> High Hold,
> but I don't know.
>
> Kaladiel Ironfist
> 19th Season Monk
> Brell Serilius
